mapper.update: update member_ck set user_pw = #{userPw}, user_name = #{userName}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, gender = #{gender}, birth = #{birth} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select A.product_name, C.order_no, B.op_volume, C.order_date, C.order_price, B.user_id from products_ck A, order_product B, order_ck C where C.order_no = B.order_no and B.product_code = A.product_code and user_id = #{userId}
